resources.string:
Q:How do I earn points?
 A:By making sustainable purchases. 

 Q:Why can\â€™t I buy some of the plants?
 A:You may not have enough points to buy some of the plants. 

 Q:How is the sustainability rating calculated?
 A:The characteristics factored into a product's sustainability rating are its seasonality, water usage, the amount of CO2 emissions, quality, and price. Each characteristic is individually rated and given a letter grade ranging from the highest grade of an A to the lowest grade F. The individual ratings are then averaged to get the sustainability rating, which also follows the A-F grading system. 

 Q:Question 3
